articles.author: Sakura Murakami
articles.title: Japan Blasts China’s UN Letter Claim as Baseless, Urges Dialogue - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: A Japanese official blasted China’s claims that Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi has altered Japan’s position on a Taiwan crisis as “entirely baseless,” calling for more dialogue to stop ties between Asia’s top economies spiraling.
articles.content: A Japanese official blasted Chinas claims that Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi has altered Japans position on a Taiwan crisis as entirely baseless, calling for more dialogue to stop ties between Asias … [+322 chars]
